title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 10 categories on the x axis representing Languages, and Native speaker in millions in each Languages on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Chinese where Native speaker in millions is 1311.0.
The lowest category is found at Lahnda where Native speaker in millions is 119.0.
The highest value at Chinese is almost 11.02 times larger than the minimum value of Lahnda.
The highest value at Chinese is almost 11.02 times larger than the minimum value of Lahnda.
The difference between the max Languages Chinese and min Languages Lahnda is 1192.0.
